title: Caddy Partnership With Light Code Labs
description: Ardan Labs (a leader in building Go enterprise software) is excited to announce that we have partnered with Light Code Labs and Matt Holt to bring Caddy into the Ardan Labs family of products and services. Caddy is a lightweight ingress service written in Go that provides automated security features and a plugin environment for extensibility. With the service being free open source (FOSS), small and large Go engineering teams finally have the ability to own and maintain their ingress and load balancing software with ease.
